Question
========
  
Which of the following change(s) in a distribution of scores will always change the value of the mean? 
Answerlist
----------
* Changing the value of 1 score from the distribution.
* Adding a new score to the distribution.
* Removing a score from the distribution.
* All of the above answers are correct.
